channel.title: Digital Transformation on Agones
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Transformation on Agones

item.title: All About AI Hype
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
All About AI Hype

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a buzzword that has permeated almost every aspect of modern life. From the way we work and communicate to how we manage our environment and interact with animals, AI’s impact is being felt far and wide. But how deep is this impact, really? Is it truly revolutionary, or is it just another over-hyped trend that will fade with time?

item.title: Business Usecases of GPT
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Business-Usecases-of-GPT

Introduction

You will not lose your job because of AI, but you may lose it because you didn’t learn how to use AI in your job.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become increasingly prevalent in the modern workplace, and one of the most promising applications of AI is the use of Generative Pre-trained Transformer (GPT) models. GPT is a type of deep learning model that is capable of generating human-like text based on a given prompt. It has been used in a wide range of applications, from language translation and sentiment analysis to chatbots and content generation.

item.title: The Interconnectedness of Life and Data
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
The Interconnectedness of Life and Data

Introduction

While reading below keep your mind open. If you can keep your religious or even scientific information aside it would help you understand my thoughts. For many of you these may be hard ideas to digest, therefore reading multiple times and thinking over again and again will help.

Life, consciousness, intelligence, force, energy, work, power, information, data, and time are highly interconnected ideas. They are so much connected, sometimes it looks difficult to define one without the other.

item.title: Will AI Replace Human?
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Artificial Intelligence can Replace Human?

The Success of ChatGPT has taken the world by storm. Unless you are not living in some cave you already know what is happening. People are asking questions like will AI replace humans? What will happen to our jobs? What are the challenges? I thought let me write my thought on this. There was significant overlap between these phases, so don’t assume that when one phase was over then only the second started.

item.title: Top 10 Technologies of Future
item.author: hari@dasarpai.com (Hari Thapliyaal)
item.description:
Top 10 Technologies of Future

Augmented Reality :

Helps surgeons see inside their patients
Help workers operating in dangerous conditions

Lab-Grown Meat: To save the environment

Address the ethical issues raised by industrial farming

Quantum Computers:

Using quantum mechanics to make calculations. These computers are many thousand times faster than our todayâ€™s computers.

Plasmonic Materials: Light controlled nanomaterial

Cure invisible cloak, nano-particles to kill cancer.

Super Advance Personal Assitant.

Experts are feeling that you can do ethical debates with digital helpers.
